CustomField.description: Enabling Accounts to auto-sync with Outreach
CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(
OwnerId != "0053g000001K3XAAA0",
OwnerId != "0053g000000nESpAAM",
RecordType.Name = "MyCase Account"),
TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enabling Accounts to auto-sync with Outreach
CustomField.label: Outreach Sync
